title: The Time-Travelling Sandwich Bites Back
description: Compton Valance has an incredible secret: he can travel through time using a stinky sandwich. And now he's in big trouble! Because his evil brother Bravo has stolen the sandwich and is biting his way through time, causing chaos. It's up to Compton and his bungling mate Bryan to stop Bravo before time runs out and the universe implodes. Yes, really. This is a highly illustrated ebook that can only be read on the Kindle Fire or other tablet.
author: Matt   Brown
